title: Former Foreign Ministers Suggest Ways For How U.N. Can Improve
teaser: The U.N. turns 70 this year and is in need of an upgrade, says former Secretary of State Madeleine Albright. She co-chaired a commission that included ex-foreign ministers and they issued a report.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
